title: North Country National Scenic Trail: Park Home
body: Adventures Await in Seven States  From New York to North Dakota, you're never far from a great outdoor adventure.When completed the trail will be the longest continuous hiking trail in the United States. The trail links scenic, natural, historic, and cultural areas across seven states allowing visitors to experience a variety of northern landscapes.Come and experience your America, at a walking pace.                Hiking the North Country Trail   From bird watching to backpacking, the North Country National Scenic Trail provides visitors an opportunity to enjoy many rewarding experien        Trail Partners   The trail continues to grow through the efforts and cooperation of many partner organizations and agencies.            Volunteer   Built and maintained primarily by volunteers, you can help by becoming part of the North Country Trail community.          Trail Safe! Series   TRAIL SAFE! is a unique safety training program designed specifically for NPS trail volunteers, but is useful to everyone.
